DOC.brief_summary: We wish to measure the inspiratory flow and volumes generated by the subjects inhaling from a spirometer with a high resistance dry powder inhaler in series in subjects with cystic fibrosis.
DOC.criteria: CF FEV1 â‰¥ 30% and < 90% predicted Be considered "terminally ill" or listed for lung transplantation Have had a lung transplant Have had a significant episode of haemoptysis (>60 ml) in the three months prior to enrolment Have had a myocardial infarction in the three months prior to enrolment Have had a cerebral vascular accident in the three months prior to enrolment Have had major ocular surgery in the three months prior to enrolment Have had major abdominal, chest or brain surgery in the three months prior to enrolment Have a known cerebral, aortic or abdominal aneurysm Be breast feeding or pregnant Be using beta blockers Have unstable asthma
